channel.title: Static Resources on Digital River
channel.description: Recent content in Static Resources on Digital River

item.title: Configure static resources in Django - Python
item.description: Working on a Django project, one of the first things that one would encounter is configuring Django for static resources such as “css”, “images”, “jpeg” and “js”. In looking at the “ StaticResources ” link that’s part of the Django documentation, it’s a bit cryptic for someone who’s starting out in Django and Python. So here’s a step-by-step on two ways to configure your static-resources in a Django project.
